products.name: Phlebotomy Training Kit #1
products.details: Advanced Phlebotomy Basket with drawer, inludes 51 place stainless steel rack, 2 bin cups, 2 Squeegie Squeezer and 3 Tube-Cubes - 9 place, 4 place and single for the Alcohol dispenser. Tubes and alcohol dispenser are not included.

products.name: Phlebotomy Tray
products.details: The Flexi-Phleb has large carrying capacity without bulk. The tray provides a handy pull out drawer that is great for storing needles, bandages and other items. The top level accepts removable TubeCUBEs that secure a variety of tubes, ice cups for temperature sensitive samples, or sharps containers. Back at the lab, merely exchange your collected samples in Tube-CUBE
